channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Html5 Audio Player – Audio Player for WordPress
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Html5 Audio Player – Audio Player for WordPress

item.title: CVE-2021-24412|2024-08-03T19:28:23.811Z -- unknown -- html5%20audio%20player%20%E2%80%93%20audio%20player%20for%20wordpress
item.description: The Html5 Audio Player – Audio Player for WordPress plugin before 2.1.3 does not sanitise or validate the parameters from its shortcode, allowing users with a role as low as contributor to set Cross-Site Scripting payload in them which will be triggered in the page/s with the embed malicious shortcode
